text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, Mr. Guinea Pig―― No, Trainer. 
Soon, you’ll have a coworker.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: A cute one, mind you. If you leave me alone, I’ll just keep running endlessly inside my wheel.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Since I’ll be a coworker anyway, if it’s good enough, maybe I could live in the same cage with you...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! Don’t worry, I was joking. Unfortunately, keeping living creatures is forbidden by school rules!
